name: Front Tool Bar
author: Gurpal Singh

sections.description:
Front Tool Bar gives wordpress users to hide or show the WordPress Toolbar on the frontend.

Overview

Front Tool Bar enables you to:
1. Hide the WordPress toolbar from frontend

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Front Tool Bar zip file to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload Plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

How it Works

  1. After activating plugin, new Menu named “Front Tool Bar“ will be added in Admin Dashboard’s Setting Tab.
  2. When clicking this menu, page to hide/show the WordPress Toolbar settings open.
  3. If admin wants to hide the WordPress Toolbar it check the checkbox.
  4. After Clicking the Submit button WordPress Toolbar hide for all users.
  5. And same functinality to show the WordPress Toolbar after uncheck the checkbox.

short_description: Front Tool Bar provides the feature to hide/show the Tool bar on frontend for users.
